Package pkgModel

Class EditGardenModel

java.lang.Object
pkgModel.GardenModel
pkgModel.EditGardenModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class EditGardenModel
extends GardenModel
implements java.io.Serializable
Author:
Ryan Dean Model class for the Edit Garden screen. Tracks plant location and garden conditions, and stores all information needed for save/load.
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • EditGardenModel

      public EditGardenModel​(ObjectCarouselModel carouselModel, java.util.List<PlantInfoModel> plantInput, java.util.HashMap<Soil,​java.util.Stack<java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double>>> plots, int budget, double scale)
      Constructor for this model class. Initializes the carousel model and fills it with the plants chosen in Select Plants.
      Parameters:
      carouselModel - The model class for the carousel in this screen.
      plantInput - A list of plant models to be placed in the carousel.
      plots - Hashmap containing all plot outlines drawn in Draw Garden, organized by soil type.
      budget - Integer representing maximum budget for this garden.
      scale - Double computed through view's DEFAULTSCALE / max_dimension of plot.

  • Method Details

    • addPlantFromCarousel

      public void addPlantFromCarousel​(int index, double init_x, double init_y)
      Helper method used to place a plant object in the garden from the carousel, increments budget/lep trackers.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of plant to be added in carousel's plants list.
      init_x - Initial x value to set the plant model to.
      init_y - Initial y value to set the plant model to.

    • inPolygon

      public boolean inPolygon​(java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double testPoint, java.util.ArrayList<java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double> polygon)
      Method used for detecting if plant object is inside a plot. Loops through adjacent vertices in plot polygon and determines if plant's point is between them, and whether its y-value (horizontal line) intersects the the polygon odd/even # of times.
      Parameters:
      testPoint - The xy coordinates of the plant object.
      polygon - The list of points that make up the outline of the garden plot.
      Returns:
      Boolean representing if point is inside polygon.

    • checkCanvas

      public boolean checkCanvas​(int index, double canvas_x, double canvas_y)
      Method for detecting whether plant objects are in a plot of the correct soil type. Uses inPolygon().
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the plant object to be tested.
      canvas_x - The x-offset of the canvas containing the plot drawings in the scene.
      canvas_y - The y-offset of the canvas containing the plot drawings in the scene.
      Returns:
      Boolean representing whether plant object is in a valid plot.

    • checkSpread

      public boolean checkSpread​(int index)
      Method for checking whether two spread circles overlap one another.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the plant spread to be tested against all other spreads.
      Returns:
      Boolean representing whether the spread experiences overlap.

    • trackMostPopularLeps

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Integer>> trackMostPopularLeps()
      Method for tracking and organizing all plant species supported by plants in the scene.
      Returns:
      List containing each plant species and an integer of the number of plants supporting it.

    • computeScaleSize

      public double computeScaleSize​(PlantObjectModel plant)
      Helper method for computing a plant object' scale given the scale factor of the garden.
      Parameters:
      plant - The plant object whose spread is to be altered.
      Returns:
      Double representing the scaled spread.

    • setPlantLocation

      public void setPlantLocation​(int index, double x, double y)
      Method to immediately change plant model's location, NOT drag it for incremental change.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the plant object to be moved in this class's plants list.
      x - New x-coordinate.
      y - New y-coordinate.

    • dragPlant

      public void dragPlant​(int index, double x, double y, double x_max, double y_max)
      Method called when controller detects plant dragging. Changes plant model's xy coordinates.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the plant object to be moved in this class's plants list.
      x - X-Coordinate of the drag event.
      y - Y-Coordinate of the drag event.
      x_max - Maximum x-value of the stackpane in view that holds the garden canvas.
      y_max - Maximum y-value of the stackpane in view that holds the garden canvas.

    • adaptPlots

      public void adaptPlots​(int canvas_width, int canvas_height)
      Method used to scale plot coordinates so that plot drawings fit on view's canvas, which is not necessarily the same size as Draw Garden's canvas.
      Parameters:
      canvas_width - Integer representing the view's canvas's width.
      canvas_height - Integer representing the view's canvas's height.
